{"id":1028911761,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1692730321,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1028911761/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Pairs Whose Sum is Less than Target","memory":"20.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int countPairs(vector<int>& nums, int target) {\n        sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());\n        int low=0,high=nums.size()-1,pairs=0;\n        while(low<high)\n        if(nums[low]+nums[high]<target){\n            pairs+=high-low;\n            low++;\n        }\n        else high--;\n        return pairs;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-pairs-whose-sum-is-less-than-target","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
